derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 6th cent.: from medieval Latin, literally he has stated on oath', from affidare

entry.tran: 宣誓书；（经陈述者宣誓在法庭上可作为证据采纳的）书面陈述
entry.def: An affidavit is a written statement which you swear is true and which may be used as evidence in a court of law.

means.word_mean: 1. written declaration made under oath; a written statement sworn to be true before someone legally authorized to administer an oath

sentences.en: The woman offered written affidavits proving that she was the widow of Pancho Villa.
